description: Janitorial services for a building in Ottawa including all supervision, labor, material, and equipment. Mandatory site visit on February 14th, 2023. Deadline for bid submission: March 3rd, 2023, 2:00 PM EST. Service to be performed in accordance with the statement of work. Trade agreements listed include *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)*, *Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement*, *Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)*, *Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement*, *Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)*, *Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)*, *Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)*, *North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)*, *Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)*, *Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)*, *Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)*, *Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement*, and *Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)*
full_summary:
===============

# Request for Proposal | Tender Solicitation for Janitorial Services

**Solicitation Title:** EJ196-211887: Janitorial Services NDMC Building

**Publication Date:** January 18, 2023

**Request for Proposal ID:** 2023-WS3773451437

### Tender Details:

*   **Scope of Work:** This tender solicitation is for janitorial services for the NDMC building, located at 1745 Alta Vista Drive, Ottawa, Ontario.
*   **Service Period:** The expected contract start date is May 1, 2023, and the expected contract end date is April 30, 2025.
*   **Tender Closing Date:** March 3, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. EST. Late submissions will not be accepted.

### Procurement Information:

*   **Procurement Method:** This is an open bidding, competitive procurement process.
*   **Selection Criteria:** The bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price.
*   **Trade Agreements:** This procurement process is subject to the World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA) and several other international trade agreements listed in the tender documents.
*   **Regions of Delivery:** The services will be delivered in Ottawa, Ontario.

### Contact Information:

*   **Contact Name:** Shauna Barrett
*   **Contact Email:** <shauna.barrett@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca>
*   **Notice URL**: <http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15166969?extsite=MTUxNjY5NjlfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==>

### Important Details:

*   A site visit has been arranged for February 14, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. Bidders must confirm attendance by February 7, 2023.
*   All bidders must submit their required documentation and bids by the closing date and time.
*   Failure to comply with the above requirements may result in the bid being deemed non-responsive.  [1](https:)//[1](https://) [1](https://)[1](https://) [1](https://)[1](https://) [1](https://)[1](https://) [1](https://)[1](https://) [1](https://) [1](https://)[1](https://)[1](
